title: Calories in Auntie Anne's Pretzel
meta_description: Discover calories in auntie annes pretzels, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and variations for the classic soft pretzel.
assumptions: Standard original soft pretzel, hand-rolled, salted, no dips or toppings; approximately 115 g serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, size, and customizations. Check Auntie Anne's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Auntie Anne's original pretzel has ~280 kcal and ~9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with store-bought info.

tweaks.label: Mini pretzel bites (10 pieces, equivalent serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Auntie Anne's pretzel?
faqs.a: About 280 kcal for the original soft pretzel.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in auntie annes pretzels?
faqs.a: One pretzel has ~56 g carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Auntie Anne's pretzels?
faqs.a: Yes, ~720 mg per pretzel due to salt topping.

faqs.q: Calories in Auntie Anne's with cheese dip?
faqs.a: Adds ~100 kcal; total ~380 kcal for pretzel plus dip.
Original is vegan, but check for cross-contamination; dips may not be.
